text: Hi Hannan. I think you are on the right track, and it’s great that you are looking at reference. It’s more that you need to look the subtle variations in each of those decisions. Light doesn’t just leave a single source and go from A to B. It leaves then bounces around, creating quite a complex environment. Similarly if you look at a shark, while they look single / two tone, there any many variations to their skin that you can integrate to make your work look more organic.
